Uses of Interface
org.strongback.components.TalonSRX

  • Packages that use TalonSRX 
    Package Description
    org.strongback.components
    This package defines a set of components that mirror real actuator, sensors, and other devices.
    org.strongback.control  
    org.strongback.hardware  

    • Uses of TalonSRX in org.strongback.components

      Methods in org.strongback.components that return TalonSRX 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.clearStickyFaults()
      Clear all sticky faults that may have been triggered.
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.enableBrakeMode(boolean brake)
      Enable the brake mode.
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.enableForwardSoftLimit(boolean enable)
      Enable the soft limit for forward throttle, which is set via the setForwardSoftLimit(int).
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.enableLimitSwitch(boolean forward, boolean reverse)
      Enable the forward and reverse limit switches.
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.enableReverseSoftLimit(boolean enable)
      Enable the soft limit for reverse throttle, which is set via the setReverseSoftLimit(int).
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.reverseSensor(boolean flip)
      Flips the sign (multiplies by negative one) the feedback device values read by the Talon.
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.setExpiration(double timeout)
      Set the motor safety expiration time in milliseconds.
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.setFeedbackDevice(TalonSRX.FeedbackDevice device)
      Set the feedback device for this controller.
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.setForwardLimitSwitchNormallyOpen(boolean normallyOpen)
      Configure the forward limit switch to be normally open or normally closed.
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.setForwardSoftLimit(int forwardLimitInDegrees)
      Set the soft limit for the forward throttle, in terms of the angle as measured by the selected input sensor.
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.setReverseLimitSwitchNormallyOpen(boolean normallyOpen)
      Configure the reverse limit switch to be normally open or normally closed.
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.setReverseSoftLimit(int reverseLimitInDegrees)
      Set the soft limit for the reverse throttle, in terms of the angle as measured by the selected input sensor.
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.setSafetyEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Set whether this motor controller's safety mode is enabled.
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.setSpeed(double speed) 
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.setStatusFrameRate(TalonSRX.StatusFrameRate frameRate, int periodMillis)
      Set the status frame rate for this controller.
      TalonSRX TalonSRX.setVoltageRampRate(double rampRate)
      The Talon SRX can be set to honor a ramp rate to prevent instantaneous changes in throttle.

    • Uses of TalonSRX in org.strongback.control

      Subinterfaces of TalonSRX in org.strongback.control 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TalonController
      A hardware-based Proportional Integral Differential (PID) controller that runs on the Talon SRX motor controller.

    • Uses of TalonSRX in org.strongback.hardware

      Methods in org.strongback.hardware that return TalonSRX 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TalonSRX Hardware.Motors.talonSRX(CANTalon talon)
      Creates a TalonSRX motor controlled by a Talon SRX.
      static TalonSRX Hardware.Motors.talonSRX(CANTalon talon, double pulsesPerDegree)
      Creates a TalonSRX motor controlled by a Talon SRX with an optional (angle) sensor.
      static TalonSRX Hardware.Motors.talonSRX(CANTalon talon, double pulsesPerDegree, double analogTurnsOverVoltageRange)
      Creates a TalonSRX motor controlled by a Talon SRX with and optional quadrature encoder and/or an analog 3.3V input wired into the Talon.
      static TalonSRX Hardware.Motors.talonSRX(int deviceNumber)
      Creates a TalonSRX motor controlled by a Talon SRX with no sensors wired as inputs.
      static TalonSRX Hardware.Motors.talonSRX(int deviceNumber, double pulsesPerDegree)
      Creates a TalonSRX motor controlled by a Talon SRX with an optional quadrature encoder and no analog input wired into the Talon.
      static TalonSRX Hardware.Motors.talonSRX(int deviceNumber, double pulsesPerDegree, double analogTurnsOverVoltageRange)
      Creates a TalonSRX motor controlled by a Talon SRX with an optional quadrature encoder and no an analog 3.3V input wired into the Talon.
      static TalonSRX Hardware.Motors.talonSRX(int deviceNumber, TalonSRX leader, boolean reverse)
      Creates a TalonSRX motor controller that follows another Talon SRX.
      Methods in org.strongback.hardware with parameters of type TalonSRX 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TalonSRX Hardware.Motors.talonSRX(int deviceNumber, TalonSRX leader, boolean reverse)
      Creates a TalonSRX motor controller that follows another Talon SRX.
